text: John Rutherford Gibson (23 March 1898 – July 1974) was an American professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1898 births Category:1974 deaths Category:People from Philadelphia Category:American soccer players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Blantyre Celtic F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Jock Gibson (footballer)
